nt2_module_use_modules(test.benchmark core.base)

if(APPLE)
  nt2_module_use_link_flags(-framework Accelerate)
endif()

SET( SOURCES
     static_fft.cpp
   )

nt2_module_add_tests(core.signal.simd.bench ${SOURCES})
